page.title: 08 (continued)
page.content: Cereal crops are also grown mainly to feed horses, which are numerous in this area. Amongst the fields and glasshouses are small reservoirs made by the growers for irrigating their crops, both indoor and out. Most of the farms are arable, altough one or two keep livestock, specifically cattle,goats,pigs, and hens. The majority of farms and smallholdings have dwelling houses on the actual property. These are either modernised farmhouses, or have been privately built to the owners' specifications. Some of the larger businesses employ foreign staff, who live in residential caravans.
